DOC.brief_summary: Despite large diffusion generic anti-hypertensive , currently use . Clinical validation study could better convince user prescribers pharmacologic validation . A pragmatic study evaluate generic anti-hypertensive efficacy propose . It take place real condition care hypertensive patient , manometer control criterion . The aim study test hypothesis non-inferiority generic anti-hypertensive blood pressure control .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Blood Pressure Control Achieved Antihypertensive Generic Drugs Moderate Severe Hypertensive Patients
